title: Digsby
description:
Digsby!

Digsby is a multiprotocol instant messaging application developed by dotSyntax, LLC. It currently supports e-mail notifications and alerts from MySpace, Facebook and Twitter.

Features - 

    * Email
          o POP3 and IMAP support for almost any email service available
          o Pre-configured email services such as Yahoo, AOL Mail, or Hotmail&#039;s webmail, emulating a POP3 or IMAP client
          o Email alerts which pop up a small window in the corner of your screen, alerting you of new mail
          o Built-in email composition, which can automatically acquire email addresses from IM profiles.

    * Social Networking
          o Support for MySpace alerts, keeping you informed of updates to your friends&#039; profiles, status, and private messages. Provides instant access to various parts of your MySpace account, such as your profile, home page, blog, etc.
          o Support for Facebook, alerting you of updates in your friend feeds.
          o Support for Twitter, allowing you to easily submit new "tweets", and view your friends&#039; tweets, as well.
          o Future support for additional social networks are currently being developed.

    * Buddy List
          o Supports metacontacts, much like Trillian&#039;s metacontacts by a simple drag-and-drop system.
          o Instant status updates.
          o Customizable ordering of all aspects of the buddy list.
          o Email and social network alerts.
          o Skinnable buddy list for a personalized look and feel.
          o Custom notifications for various actions such as contacts signing in/out, messages sent/received, etc
          o Buddy list, IM accounts, widgets, and application settings are synchronized on Digsby&#039;s server, so all your settings are transferred between installations on other computers.
